sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'
import { Text, View } from 'react-native'

const Data=[
  {Title:'How Are You ?',ansa:'malangGaba',}
]


export default function Level1() {

  const [SelectData,setSelectData]=useState(false)
   const Test=()=>{
     setSelectData(!SelectData)
   }
  return (
    <View style={{flex:1,}}>
        <View style={{ width: '100%', height: '15%', backgroundColor: '#2f7a8f', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center' }}>
        <Text style={{ fontSize: 32, fontWeight: 'bold', color: 'white' }}>Computer Quiz</Text>
      </View>
      <View style={{alignItems:'center',marginVertical:20}}>
        <View style={{}}>
        <Text>Question 1</Text>
        </View>
        <View style={{flex:1,marginVertical:10,alignItems:'center'}}>
        <View style={{width:'90%',height:'35%',borderRadius:20,backgroundColor:'white',elevation:4}}>
            <Text style={{margin:10,fontSize:16,color:'green',fontWeight:'bold',marginTop:20}}>The term ‘Computer’ is derived from__________?</Text>
             
             <View style={{marginLeft:20}}>
            <Text style={{margin:4,fontSize:18,backgroundColor:SelectData?'green':'red',}}>A. Latin</Text>
             <Text style={{margin:4,fontSize:18,}}>B. German</Text>
             <Text style={{margin:4,fontSize:18,}}>C. French</Text>
             <Text style={{margin:4,fontSize:18,}}>D. Arabic</Text>
             </View>
        </View>
    </View>

      </View>
    </View>
  )
}
